main event: Approximately 6 or 7 witnesses in a remote area on the outskirts of Clarksburg, West Virginia, reported observing an object moving in a 'figure eight' path at high speed during the early evening hours of September 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as cigar-shaped and metallic, with no visible means of propulsion., It exhibited flashing lights and appeared to ascend rapidly before disappearing from view., Witnesses reported seeing the object move in a 'figure eight' pattern., One witness, familiar with aircraft, stated it did not resemble any known aircraft., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.
sighted object: a cigar-shaped metallic object with flashing lights
witness description: a family and additional witnesses in a remote area
